page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: The town has grown so quickly that open spaces are not as plentiful as they might be.There are several recreation grounds scattered about the town and these are used very fully both for organised sport and childrens games.The town boasts its own cricket and football teams and has a stadium for sports and football. A swimming pool has been built and this year work has started on a large leisure centre situated adjacent to the pool.Many of the secondary schools have been designated community schools and one or two have large sports halls for public use. Yachting and sailing is a great local sport as is wind surfing.One favourite leisure time activity is just simply lazing on the shore watching the ships go by.
